lines.text: Do you want a glass?
Do I want a glass? No, wrap it in a taco dumb motherf - -er, yes I want a glass.
Hey, stay bent over like that and I'll show you a good time.
Oh yeah? one quick hump and you'd be in the hospital honey.
Hey Rizzoli, you ever get it doggy style?
No, but tell me, what's it like?

[reveals bulletproof vest after being shot by Rita Rizzoli in the chest]
Kevlar, bitch!

[shoots him again in the throat, sending him crashing into a car windshield]
Smith & Wesson, asshole!
Now, either you take your time, and get the f - - outta here, or I'm gonna cut your dick off

[petrified]
I have to go now...
What the hell kept ya? Stopped to pick up a a sailor?
Yeah, I almost had one too, but your mother beat me to him.
How did it go?
Oh fine if you don't mind getting your ass chewed. Fortunately I have more ass than he's got teeth.
You know, now that I see you, it raises a question in my mind.
Yeah, what's that?
Does that come in adult size?
And don't call me bitch!
I'm gonna break inside your apartment, and I'm gonna kick your ass, and then maybe for dessert I'll f - - your brains out

[chokes with laughter]
Be still my heart!
You's think this is a lot of talk?
I hope not, cause you're everything I've ever wanted in a man! I mean really, a snot-nosed little whip-dick, in designer jeans?

[a witness is speaking Chinese]
What is she saying?
I told you, I speak *Japanese* not *Chinese*.
Is there a difference?

[a witness is speaking Chinese]
What is she saying?
I told you, I speak *Japanese* not *Chinese*.
Is there a difference?
